long_description: mieles don ferro is a family owned business based in quebec, canada. it all started with one hive in 2000. our main objective is to commercialize honey from meliponas bees in a responsible way. it is a high quality, 100% natural product. our hives are located in the alturas de banao ecological reserve; in south central cuba. m elipona honey is the most extraordinary sweet liquid that existe on planet earth. it is a powerful superfood gathered by one of the most unique creatures on our planet.
